mapper.sql: Org_Auto, Carbase_Auto, IsOn, [Status], CUser, CDT, Muser, MDT
mapper.select:
declare @User_Auto bigint=#{param.userAuto},--使用人userAuto @appType int=#{param.appType},--1公务车 2主管用车 @oilName varchar(20)=#{param.oilName}--动力方式 ,@bsTypeN varchar(10)=#{param.bsTypeN}--排挡方式 ,@carArea varchar(10)=#{param.carArea}--牌照地区 ,@type int =#{param.type} --1 自动配车 2获取车辆列表 BEGIN declare @Org_Auto int ,@IsSalesDep int select @Org_Auto=Org_Auto from v_Emp where User_Auto=@User_Auto select @IsSalesDep=IsSalesDep from v_Emp where User_Auto=@User_Auto begin declare @carSName varchar(4) if(@carArea='江苏') set @carSName='苏' if(@carArea='安徽') set @carSName='皖' if(@carArea='浙江') set @carSName='浙' if(@carArea='广东') set @carSName='粤' if(@carArea='福建') set @carSName='闽' if(@carArea='山东') set @carSName='鲁' if(@carArea='湖南') set @carSName='湘' if(@carArea='上海') set @carSName='沪' if(@carArea='江西') set @carSName='赣' end if(@type=1) begin if(@appType=1)--公务车 begin if(@IsSalesDep=1)--营业 begin --1单位 select top 1 aa.* from( select distinct o.Carbase_Auto ,c.MakNo ,i.ItemName oilName ,carStatusN=case when cm.carStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.carStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,isnull(cm.totalDistance,0) totalDistance ,isnull(cm.residueDL,'0%') residueDL ,isnull(cm.mileage,0) mileage ,tipStatus=case when cm.tipStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.tipStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,c.CC ,b.BrandName ,cn.ClasenName ,c.CarColor ,i2.ItemName bsTypeN ,cse.WHType ,i3.ItemName whTypeN1 ,i3.ItemName whTypeN2 from Org_Car o left join CarBase c on o.Carbase_Auto=c.CarBase_Auto left join AspNet.dbo.Org og on o.Org_Auto=og.Org_Auto left join Clasen cn on c.Clasen_Auto=cn.Clasen_Auto left join Brand b on c.Brand_Auto=b.Brand_Auto left join CarApplication ca on o.Carbase_Auto=ca.Carbase_Auto left join CarStatusEdit cse on cse.CarBase_Auto = o.Carbase_Auto left join ItemCode i3 on i3.num = cse.WHType and i3.ItemType=826--仓库别 left join ItemCode i on i.num = c.oil and i.ItemType=231 --燃油种类 left join ItemCode i2 on i2.num = c.BSType and i2.ItemType=841 --变速类型 left join CarMessage cm on cm.carBaseAuto=o.Carbase_Auto where o.[Status]=1 and o.IsOn=1 and o.Org_Auto=@Org_Auto and isnull(ca.Status,0) not in(10,20,21,30) )aa where (aa.oilName=@oilName or aa.oilName LIKE '%'+@oilName+'%') and aa.bsTypeN=@bsTypeN and aa.MakNo LIKE '%'+@carSName+'%' end else begin --2调度中心 select top 1 aa.* from (select o.Carbase_Auto ,c.MakNo ,i.ItemName oilName ,carStatusN=case when cm.carStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.carStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,isnull(cm.totalDistance,0) totalDistance ,isnull(cm.residueDL,'0%') residueDL ,isnull(cm.mileage,0) mileage ,tipStatus=case when cm.tipStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.tipStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,c.CC ,b.BrandName ,cn.ClasenName ,c.CarColor ,i2.ItemName bsTypeN ,cse.WHType ,i3.ItemName whTypeN1 ,i3.ItemName whTypeN2 from Org_Car o left join CarBase c on o.Carbase_Auto=c.CarBase_Auto left join AspNet.dbo.Org og on o.Org_Auto=og.Org_Auto left join Clasen cn on c.Clasen_Auto=cn.Clasen_Auto left join Brand b on c.Brand_Auto=b.Brand_Auto left join CarStatusEdit cse on cse.CarBase_Auto = o.Carbase_Auto left join ItemCode i3 on i3.num = cse.WHType and i3.ItemType=826--仓库别 left join ItemCode i on i.num = c.oil and i.ItemType=231 --燃油种类 left join ItemCode i2 on i2.num = c.BSType and i2.ItemType=841 --变速类型 left join CarMessage cm on cm.carBaseAuto=o.Carbase_Auto where o.[Status]=1 and o.IsOn=1 and o.Org_Auto=9999 )aa where (aa.oilName=@oilName or aa.oilName LIKE '%'+@oilName+'%') and aa.bsTypeN=@bsTypeN and aa.MakNo LIKE '%'+@carSName+'%' and aa.Carbase_Auto not in (select distinct Carbase_Auto from CarApplication where Carbase_Auto!=0 and ((Status in(10,20) and IsSave=0) or(Status in(10,20,21,30) and IsSave=1))) order by aa.Carbase_Auto desc end end else begin --3未结案 select top 1 aa.* from (select cse.Carbase_Auto ,c.MakNo ,i.ItemName oilName ,carStatusN=case when cm.carStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.carStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,isnull(cm.totalDistance,0) totalDistance ,isnull(cm.residueDL,'0%') residueDL ,isnull(cm.mileage,0) mileage ,tipStatus=case when cm.tipStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.tipStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,c.CC ,b.BrandName ,cn.ClasenName ,c.CarColor ,i2.ItemName bsTypeN ,cse.WHType ,i3.ItemName whTypeN1 ,i3.ItemName whTypeN2 from CarStatusEdit cse left join CarBase c on cse.Carbase_Auto=c.CarBase_Auto left join ItemCode i4 on cse.CarStatus=i4.Num and i4.ItemType=885 left join Clasen cn on c.Clasen_Auto=cn.Clasen_Auto left join Brand b on c.Brand_Auto=b.Brand_Auto left join ItemCode i3 on i3.num = cse.WHType and i3.ItemType=826--仓库别 left join ItemCode i on i.num = c.oil and i.ItemType=231 --燃油种类 left join ItemCode i2 on i2.num = c.BSType and i2.ItemType=841 --变速类型 left join CarMessage cm on cm.carBaseAuto=cse.Carbase_Auto where i4.num!=3 --3结案 and cse.IsOn=1 )aa where (aa.oilName=@oilName or aa.oilName LIKE '%'+@oilName+'%') and aa.bsTypeN=@bsTypeN and aa.MakNo LIKE '%'+@carSName+'%' end end if(@type=2) begin if(@appType=1)--公务车 begin if(@IsSalesDep=1)--营业 begin --1单位 select aa.* from( select distinct o.Carbase_Auto ,c.MakNo ,i.ItemName oilName ,carStatusN=case when cm.carStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.carStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,isnull(cm.totalDistance,0) totalDistance ,isnull(cm.residueDL,'0%') residueDL ,isnull(cm.mileage,0) mileage ,tipStatus=case when cm.tipStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.tipStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,c.CC ,b.BrandName ,cn.ClasenName ,c.CarColor ,i2.ItemName bsTypeN ,cse.WHType ,i3.ItemName whTypeN1 ,i3.ItemName whTypeN2 from Org_Car o left join CarBase c on o.Carbase_Auto=c.CarBase_Auto left join AspNet.dbo.Org og on o.Org_Auto=og.Org_Auto left join Clasen cn on c.Clasen_Auto=cn.Clasen_Auto left join Brand b on c.Brand_Auto=b.Brand_Auto left join CarApplication ca on o.Carbase_Auto=ca.Carbase_Auto left join CarStatusEdit cse on cse.CarBase_Auto = o.Carbase_Auto left join ItemCode i3 on i3.num = cse.WHType and i3.ItemType=826--仓库别 left join ItemCode i on i.num = c.oil and i.ItemType=231 --燃油种类 left join ItemCode i2 on i2.num = c.BSType and i2.ItemType=841 --变速类型 left join CarMessage cm on cm.carBaseAuto=o.Carbase_Auto where o.[Status]=1 and o.IsOn=1 and o.Org_Auto=@Org_Auto and isnull(ca.Status,0) not in(10,20,21,30) )aa where (aa.oilName=@oilName or aa.oilName LIKE '%'+@oilName+'%') and aa.bsTypeN=@bsTypeN and aa.MakNo LIKE '%'+@carSName+'%' end else begin --2调度中心 select aa.* from (select o.Carbase_Auto ,c.MakNo ,i.ItemName oilName ,carStatusN=case when cm.carStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.carStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,isnull(cm.totalDistance,0) totalDistance ,isnull(cm.residueDL,'0%') residueDL ,isnull(cm.mileage,0) mileage ,tipStatus=case when cm.tipStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.tipStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,c.CC ,b.BrandName ,cn.ClasenName ,c.CarColor ,i2.ItemName bsTypeN ,cse.WHType ,i3.ItemName whTypeN1 ,i3.ItemName whTypeN2 from Org_Car o left join CarBase c on o.Carbase_Auto=c.CarBase_Auto left join AspNet.dbo.Org og on o.Org_Auto=og.Org_Auto left join Clasen cn on c.Clasen_Auto=cn.Clasen_Auto left join Brand b on c.Brand_Auto=b.Brand_Auto left join CarStatusEdit cse on cse.CarBase_Auto = o.Carbase_Auto left join ItemCode i3 on i3.num = cse.WHType and i3.ItemType=826--仓库别 left join ItemCode i on i.num = c.oil and i.ItemType=231 --燃油种类 left join ItemCode i2 on i2.num = c.BSType and i2.ItemType=841 --变速类型 left join CarMessage cm on cm.carBaseAuto=o.Carbase_Auto where o.[Status]=1 and o.IsOn=1 and o.Org_Auto=9999 )aa where (aa.oilName=@oilName or aa.oilName LIKE '%'+@oilName+'%') and aa.bsTypeN=@bsTypeN and aa.MakNo LIKE '%'+@carSName+'%' and aa.Carbase_Auto not in (select distinct Carbase_Auto from CarApplication where Carbase_Auto!=0 and ((Status in(10,20) and IsSave=0) or(Status in(10,20,21,30) and IsSave=1))) order by aa.Carbase_Auto desc end end else begin --3未结案 select aa.* from (select cse.Carbase_Auto ,c.MakNo ,i.ItemName oilName ,carStatusN=case when cm.carStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.carStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,isnull(cm.totalDistance,0) totalDistance ,isnull(cm.residueDL,'0%') residueDL ,isnull(cm.mileage,0) mileage ,tipStatus=case when cm.tipStatus=0 then '关闭' when cm.tipStatus=1 then '打开' else '' end ,c.CC ,b.BrandName ,cn.ClasenName ,c.CarColor ,i2.ItemName bsTypeN ,cse.WHType ,i3.ItemName whTypeN1 ,i3.ItemName whTypeN2 from CarStatusEdit cse left join CarBase c on cse.Carbase_Auto=c.CarBase_Auto left join ItemCode i4 on cse.CarStatus=i4.Num and i4.ItemType=885 left join Clasen cn on c.Clasen_Auto=cn.Clasen_Auto left join Brand b on c.Brand_Auto=b.Brand_Auto left join ItemCode i3 on i3.num = cse.WHType and i3.ItemType=826--仓库别 left join ItemCode i on i.num = c.oil and i.ItemType=231 --燃油种类 left join ItemCode i2 on i2.num = c.BSType and i2.ItemType=841 --变速类型 left join CarMessage cm on cm.carBaseAuto=cse.Carbase_Auto where i4.num!=3 --3结案 and cse.IsOn=1 )aa where (aa.oilName=@oilName or aa.oilName LIKE '%'+@oilName+'%') and aa.bsTypeN=@bsTypeN and aa.MakNo LIKE '%'+@carSName+'%' end end
END

--判断车子有没有被申请 declare @CarBase_Auto bigint=#{carBaseAuto} begin declare @CSum int select @CSum=count(CarApplication_Auto) --如果@CSum>0,返回“当前车辆已被申请，请选择其他车辆” from CarApplication where @Carbase_Auto > 0 and Carbase_Auto=@Carbase_Auto and ((Status in(10,20) and IsSave=0) or(Status in(10,20,30) and IsSave=1)) --Status -1取消、0暂存、5驳回、10送件、20核准、30出车、40还车 --IsSave 是否提前申请 1是 0否
select @CSum num end
